Paterson''s Disciple Bacon:
Start is to try to use the power of the Spirits of Wind to restore the barrier. Despite its destructive power, when used correctly, it can help to restore it.
The problem is how to get this power of the Spirits of the Wind... I Think she's got monsters in the vicinity of the border. In the end, this power to affect them. In Sea Dispute can be found long-Haired Stacato and Rikala Low Grade. Kill them and collect 20 Fragments of Wind Energy.
